page.title: 12Health
page.content: There is no doctor's surgery in Gauldry or Balmerino.The nearest surgery is in Newport which is 4 miles away.This is very inconvenient for patients who do not have a car as there is only one bus in and out of the village each day.There is a group practice of doctor's in Newport of 5 doctors and they cover Wormit,Newport, Tayport,Gauldry,Balmerino and also some patients in Leuchars. At the moment there is a strong campaign being fought by several families to have a monthly clinic held in the village for the children from birth to 5 years.Discussions with the Health Authorities are underway but progress is very slow.The health visitor contacted the school and the Headteacher,Mrs.Balfour has agreed to provide a school room once a month.There is no decision yet.
